title: Just Another Rant On Trash Game Development...
body:
Riot... i really hope u can fix the dmg system :| legit played against mords a few rounds ( didnt see him worthy of ban) i regretted that he got 3 items press 2 abilities on me and killed me :| i had hex drinker too... we are stuck in a game where everychamp either does insane dmg (one shot worthy) does insane combo (pretty much oneshot) or a champ doesnt doesnt do anything :\ (supports not included) so that fact is that champ dmg is on wack :| and we struggling also those nasus buffs were ... idk |8\  pretty dumb but yeh pelase fix this.
tldr this might seem stupid to higher teir players but im in silver my 2-3/5 out of my teammates usually lack alot of game knowledge but yeh so its a struggle; for example im standing there and i have jhin with heal and thresh with lantern that can save me but decide not to.. or even basixs like warding in jg and kiting so... dont say im rambling stupidly

replies.body: dude mord legit went around one shotting everychamp in the game through magic resist his healing was insane he gained sheilds pushed towers insane he legit was insane for patches the same way karthus was

Of all the things to complain about, you chose mordekaiser?

This is why nobody takes these posts seriously.
